import React from "react"; function Resume() { return (

Mike Kowols

Major Accomplishments

Built a new internal ordering website at Gold Eagle. Also, at Gold Eagle I created batch processes to simplify the process of creating orders for potential new clients. Created a website for the corporate cafeteria at Cooper’s Hawk. Rebuilt Cooper’s Hawk new employee blog. Created a new product website for new product launch at Tuthill.

Technical Skills

Languages: CSS, HTML, JavaScript, jQuery, Angular, React, SQL, ASP, C#, Java, XML, ASP.net MVC, PHP, Perl
Databases: Oracle, Microsoft SQL Server, MySQL, Ingres
Platforms: Windows, Linux
Software: Magento, Eclipse, Adobe Suite (Dreamweaver,Fireworks,Photoshop) Homesite, Emacs, VI, Visual Studio,
WordPress, WooCommerce, Shopify, Microsoft Access

Professional Experience

Programmer - eTech360 - Northbrook, IL - November 2020 - February 2021
  • Used HTML, CSS, PHP, and JQuery to make updates to CodeIgniter based project. Gained experience working in an agile environment with 2 week sprints. Worked on bug fixes and new functionality for tools used by internal employees to work with customers.
eCommerce Web Developer - Tuthill - October 2019 - June 2020
  • Used HTML, CSS, JQuery, and Coldfusion to make updates to Mura based web properties.
  • Worked with the Marketing team on designs for Salesforce Pardot forms, landing pages, and marketing emails. Set up a wordpress based site for product roll out. This included setting up a linux box running Ubuntu on AWS, installing Apache 2, mySql, and PHP.
  • Worked on replacing intranet website. Selected ecommerce and ipaas (Integration platform as a service) partners as part of a committee.
Application Developer - Cooper’s Hawk - April 2019 - October 2019
  • Used HTML, CSS, JQuery, and PHP to make updates to the X-Cart based ecommerce site. Worked on updating CRAFT CMS based site.
  • Set up a wordpress site for the buildings cafeteria managed by the company. This included setting up a linux box running CentOS on Azure, installing Apache 2, mySql, and PHP.
  • Worked with the financial team on solutions to ongoing reporting issues.
e-Commerce Web Developer - Gold Eagle - August 2017 - January 2019
  • Used HTML, CSS (responsive), JQuery, and PHP to make updates to the website. Wrote web service calls using C#.
  • Created tools for team members to use to pull reports on demand. Helped relaunch the company's external and internal WooCommerce websites.
Web Developer – National Cycle - May 2016 - June 2017
  • Worked with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, JQuery, PHP, and Perl to make updates to the functionality of the company's Magento based website.
  • This included creating extensions too magento plugins. Also handled general hardware related IT duties.
Front End Web Developer – Starling Eyewear - October 2015 - March 2016
  • Used HTML, CSS (responsive), and PHP to make updates to the functionality of the company’s Magento based e-commerce website.
  • Worked closely with the graphics team to execute vision for a responsively designed site.
Consultant – Compusystems - August 2015 - October 2015
  • Worked as a consultant on web sites comparable to those I worked on when I was a full time employee.
Web Programmer – Strategic Account Management Association - March 2015 - May 2015
  • Responsible for making updates to the main company website using ASP.net and setting up event registration sites using 3rd party software, eTouches.
  • Worked as onsite staff for the company's annual conference.
Web Programmer – Compusystems - April 2009 - February 2015
  • Used HTML, CSS, JavaScript and JQuery to create jsp pages for trade show registration websites for external clients.
  • Helped mentor newer web programmers as the team expanded.
Web Developer - Stats LLC - October 2007 – March 2009
  • Utilized SQL, stored procedures, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to create fantasy sports websites based on client specifications.
  • Also created an internal wiki site and handled on-call duties.
Systems Analyst – Donlen Corporation - May 2006 – September 2007
  • Utilized Java, XML, and SQL to fix bugs, add new functionality, and make improvements to web based software used by internal and external clients to manage their leased vehicles.

Education

Bachelors of Science Degree – May 2006
Western Illinois University, Macomb, IL
Major: Computer Science
Minor: Management
); } export default Resume;
